column1: Esmeralda was the youngest of the five children of [[Adalgrim Took]]. She married [[Saradoc Brandybuck]], making her Mistress of Buckland and of [[Brandy Hall]].  She and Saradoc had one child, [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]]. As she was the younger sister of Thain [[Paladin Took II]], her son, Meriadoc, was first cousins with the Thain's children: [[Peregrin Took]] and his sisters, [[Pearl Took

column2: Esmeralda]]'' is the Spanish word for "[[Wikipedia:Emerald
column3: emerald]]".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
